Package main

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
main.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchaseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dragon, GiantMonster, HydraMonster, Team, Vampire, WereWolfMonster, ZombieMonster
public class Monster extends Object implements Purchaseable
This class describes the Parent monster class
Author:
angusburrowes

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(String name, int monsterMaxHealth, int heal, int damage, int reach, int purchasePrice, int sellingPrice, int experience, int levels, String about)
      Monster constructor class
      Parameters:
      name - name given to monster
      monsterMaxHealth - Maximum health monster has
      heal - the amount a monster can heal by
      damage - the damage given by the monster
      reach - the aggression a monster starts with
      purchasePrice - how much it costs to purchase monster
      sellingPrice - how much can be earned from selling monster
      experience - current experience of monster capped at 100
      levels - current level of monster, increases when xp reaches 100 and buffs monster stats briefly
      about - description of monster

    • Monster

      public Monster()
      Constructor when nothing is given. For generating random monsters.

    • Monster

      public Monster(int difficulty)
      constructor to create random monster when difficulty set
      Parameters:
      difficulty - how difficult the player wants the game to be.
